books.title: The Secret History
books.author: Procopius
books.summary: Procopius recounts the supposed true history of Justinian’s reign.

books.title: The Elusive Pimpernel
books.author: Baroness Orczy
books.summary: A French official schemes to finally catch the Scarlet Pimpernel.

books.title: The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin
books.author: Benjamin Franklin
books.summary: Benjamin Franklin writes about his youth, adventures, and achievements.

books.title: Recollections of Full Years
books.author: Helen Herron Taft
books.summary: Helen Herron Taft, wife of William Howard Taft, the twenty-seventh President of the United States, recalls her life married to one of America’s most influential political figures.

books.title: The Gold Bat
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: The boys of Wrykyn School battle to defend their honor against rival sports teams and enemies from within.

books.title: Fanny’s First Play
books.author: George Bernard Shaw
books.summary: A young woman writes a play to shock her father, in which two respectable families deal with their with disreputable children.

books.title: A Midsummer Night’s Dream
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: This comedy follows four lovers and a thespian who become bewitched by fairies.

books.title: Beyond Thirty
books.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs
books.summary: A young naval officer finds himself in a forbidden part of the world after storms waylay his ship.

books.title: Understood Betsy
books.author: Dorothy Canfield Fisher
books.summary: A young girl discovers independence, responsibility, and newfound confidence after being sent to live in a farmhouse with her extended family.

books.title: Ghost Stories
books.author: E. F. Benson
books.summary: A collection of ghost stories by E. F. Benson.

books.title: Travel Essays
books.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
books.summary: A collection of Robert Louis Stevenson’s travel essays.

books.title: The Innocence of Father Brown
books.author: G. K. Chesterton
books.summary: Amateur detective and Catholic priest Father Brown solves mysteries in this first collection of Father Brown short stories.

books.title: History of the Peloponnesian War
books.author: Thucydides
books.summary: A contemporary history of the ancient Greek war between Athens and Sparta and their allies.

books.title: Roads to Freedom
books.author: Bertrand Russell
books.summary: Bertrand Russell investigates the merits and potential shortcomings of different socialist tendencies.

books.title: The Canterbury Tales
books.author: Geoffrey Chaucer
books.summary: A group of pilgrims trade tales as they travel through medieval England.

books.title: Penguin Island
books.author: Anatole France
books.summary: A myopic saint mistakenly baptizes some penguins, ushering in a centuries-spanning satire of French history.

books.title: The Big Time
books.author: Fritz Leiber
books.summary: A motley collection of servicemembers escape a plot as two mysterious factions wage an epic war across time itself.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Mack Reynolds
books.summary: A collection of science fiction short stories by Mack Reynolds ordered by date of publication.

books.title: The Four Men
books.author: Hilaire Belloc
books.summary: Hilaire Belloc takes a pilgrimage across his beloved home English county of Sussex writing as four distinct personalities, with a wide variety of songs, stories, and digressions.

books.title: A Negro Explorer at the North Pole
books.author: Matthew Henson
books.summary: The self-told story of the black man who accompanied Robert Peary during the first trip to the North Pole.
